MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK8 postcode area of Stirling. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:00pm to safely complete repair works on our underground cable network outside number 8 Murray Place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:17pm on Friday, 05 March 2021
